Contaminants: Bromodichloromethane;Bromoform;Chloroform;Chromium (hexavalent);Dibromochloromethane;Dichloroacetic acid;Total trihalomethanes (TTHMs);Trichloroacetic acid;Barium;Bromochloroacetic acid;Bromodichloroacetic acid;Chlorodibromoacetic acid;Chromium (total);Dibromoacetic acid;Fluoride;Haloacetic acids (HAA5);Manganese;Molybdenum;Monobromoacetic acid;Nitrate and nitrite;Strontium;Tribromoacetic acid;Vanadium
